titles.title: Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael (fols. 4ra-113vb) I-1) Homily of Timothy (Dämatewos), Patriarch of Alexandria for the 12th of Ḫǝdar (fols. 4ra-11vb); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 11vb-13va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 13va-vb) I-2) Homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs the Orthodox [by an anonymous author] for the 12th of Taḫśaś (fols. 13vb-20rb); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 20rb-22ra); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 22ra) I-3) MGM-002: Homily [by Epiphanius, Metropolitan of Cyprus] for Ṭǝrr (fols. 22rb-32vb); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fol. 33ra-vb); ʾarke-hymn (fols. 33vb-34ra) I-4) Homily by an anonymous author for Yäkkatit (fols. 34ra-38ra); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 38ra-39va) I-5) Homily by [Severus] Patriarch of Antiochia for the 12th of Mäggabit (fols. 39vb-58va); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 58va-60va) I-6) Homily by [Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs] the Orthodox for Miyazya (fols. 60vb-66ra); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 66ra-68va) I-7 Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Ethiopia for Gǝnbot (fols. 68va-70va); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 70va-72vb) I-8) Homily by [Yoḥannǝs], Metropolitan of Aksum [for Säne] (fols. 72vb-80vb); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 80vb-84ra) I-9) Homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs for Ḥamle (fols. 84ra-89rb); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 89rb-91rb) I-10) Homily by an anonymous author for Näḥase (fols. 91rb-95va); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 98va-98ra) I-11) Homily by an anonymous author for Mäskäräm (fols. 98ra-102rb); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 102rb-105vb) I-12) Homily by an anonymous author for Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 106ra-111va); miracle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 111va-113vb)
Additiones 1-3.

donors.donor: The names of the original commissioners or donors were erased throughout the Ms. (s. also Additio 3) and replaced with those of ʾAḍqä Maryam (also ʿAṣqä on fol. 11vb) and Qama Dǝngǝl.)

txstates.txstate: The Ms. was resewn. The cover has been partly detached from the spine, probably to facilitate the resewing. 2/3 of fol. 2 is cut off.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 8 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, small x, corni form, x-form, double crescent, double sine wave with dots, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes and tears are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 3, stub before 1/fols. 1r-3v) –I(10/fols. 4r-13v) – ፪II(10/fols. 14r-23v) – ፫III(8/fols. 24r-31v) – ፬IV(10/fols. 32r-41v) – ፭V(10/fols. 42r-51v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 52r-59v) – ፯VII(10/fols. 60r-69v) – ፰VIII(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 70r-77v) – ፱IX(10/fols. 78r-87v) – ፲X(10/fols. 88r-97v) – ፲፩XIV(10/fols. 98r-107v) – ፲፪XV(7; s.l.: 3, stub after 5/fols. 108r-114v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling. The scribe did not use the bottom ruled line on fol. 7ra.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist and other angels such as Gäbrǝʾel (fols. 27rb, 28rb, 84vb, 88rb, 100r); names of the commissioners (erased and replaced); elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I (alternating with black lines), two initial lines in the incipit of sections; in some cases, two or three lines in the incipit of sections alternating with black lines; two initial lines in the incipit of subsections (miracles); the first word in the incipit of subsections (hymns), e.g., sälam "salutation".

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1, I-7 and I-8 include in the incipit sacred and secret names of God and angels: - ... አርፍቃኤል፡ አዘቅታኤል፡ ሕዝቅናኤል፡ ምርሜል፡ ስመ፡ አምላክ፡ .... fol. 4ra: - ... ኅቡእ፡ ወግሁድ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ኤሎሄ፡ ኤሎሄ፡ ኤሎሄ፡ ያዊ፡ ያዊ፡ ያዊ፡ ጸባኦት፡ አፍላናቶን፡ አፍላናታ፡ ... (fol. 68va) - ... ስንኵራ፡ ኳራኤል፡ አጕለጕደደን፡ ሰቀሪናኤል፡ ዮትፓፓኤል፡ ተንብል፡ በእንቲአነ፡ ኦሚካኤል፡ ... (fol. 72vb)
For each month, the miracles include the following ʾarke-hymns: I-1) እንበለ፡ ሕማም፡ አምላክ፡ አመ፡ ከመ፡ ዮም፡ ... (fol. 13rb-va) I-2) ኦዘሐወፅኮሙ፡ ለደቂቀ፡ ሥርዓት፡ ሠለስቱ፡ ... (fols. 21va-22ra) I-3) ኦዘረዳእኮ፡ ለቴዎድሮስ፡ መዋኢ። ... (fol. 33vb) I-4) ኦዘወሀብኮ፡ እምአፈ፡ በላዒ፡ መብልዓ። ... (fol. 39rb-va) I-5) ኦዘተዛለፍኮ፡ ለበለዓም፡ ውስተ፡ ፍኖቱ። ... (fol. 60rb-va) I-6) ኦዘባላሕኮሙ፡ በወርኃ፡ ሚያዝያ፡ ባልሖ።. .. (fol. 68rb-va) I-7) ኦእንተ፡ ጾርከ፡ ለክሳድ፡ እድ፡ አኃዜ። ... (fol. 72va) I-8) ኦዘአጽናዕከ፡ እምኃጕለ፡ ድቀት፡ ወትንታኔ። ... (fol. 83vb) I-9) ኦዘቀተልኮ፡ ለሰናክሬምሃ፡ጸዓሌ። ፈጣሬ፡ ... (fol. 91ra) I-10) ኦዘአጽናዕከ፡ ቍስጣንጢኖስሃ፡ ኃሣሤ። ... (fols. 97vb-98ra) I-11) ኦዘፈወስኮ፡ ለሕዝቅያስ፡ እምደዌሁ። ... (fol. 105va-vb) I-12) ኦዘኃደጎ፡ ለዘኃደጎ፡ መንፈሱ። ... (fol. 113va-vb).

additional.cont: Fol. 39va: Rhymed praise for mämmǝre Täklä Mikaˀel.
additional.det: The note is written in Amharic and Gәʿәz, in the same hand as Additio 2. Täklä Mikaʾel is praised for the community flourished (or for building up the community house) during his gäbäz tenure. The praise is preceded by the names of his ancestors mämmǝre Täsfay and mämmǝre Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer.

additional.cont: Fols. 60va, 60vb and 61r (upper margin): Rhymed praise for fitawrari Wändu, son of ˀato Täsfay.
additional.det: The note is written in Amharic and Gәʿәz, in the same hand as Additio 1. It begins on fol. 60va and continues in the upper margin of fols. 60vb and 61ra. Fitawrari Wändu is praised for renovating the church of Mikaʾel. As in Additio 1, the praise is preceded by the names of his ancestors mämmǝre Täsfay and mämmǝre Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer.The name of Wäldä Mikaʾel was written above the erased name of Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer.

additional.cont: Fol. 113vb: Donation note or note on commissioning the writing.
additional.det: Fol. 113vb: Donation note or note on commissioning the writing. The note has been written in the main hand. Two lines with the names of the commissioners or donors have been erased.

extras.extra: - The title ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት። is written in the margin of fol. 52vb, in a recent hand. - Omitted letters and words inserted interlineally: fols. 4vab, 64rb, 66va. - Corrections written over erasure: fols. 96rb, 97va. - Thin lines used to fill the line: fols. 27ra, 39vb. - Corrections in pen: fols. 100rb, 101ra, 112rab. - Drawings in pencil: fols. 1v, 3r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Undecorated quire marks are written in the left upper corner: fols. 14r: ፪, 24r: ፫, 32r: ፬, 42r: ፭, 52r: ፮, 60: ፯, 70r: ፰, 78r: ፱, 88r: ፲, 98r: ፲፩, 108r: ፲፪.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Monthly readings are indicated by the names of the months written in red between thin lines, in the middle of the upper margin: ኅዳር: fol. 4r ታኅሣሥ: fol. 13v ዘጥር: fol. 22r ዘየካቲት: fol. 34r ዘመጋቢት: fol. 39v ዘሚያዝያ: fol. 60v ዘግንቦት: fol. 68v ዘሰኔ: fol. 72v ዘሐምሌ: fol. 84r ዘነሐሴ: fol. 91r ዘመስከረም: fol. 98r ዘጥቅምት: fol. 106r.
